participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, Emily loves to explore new things and enjoys playing games.
participant_1.background: i love to play pobox. i am a 12 year old girl. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i do not have many friends.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Caring and active, Sarah balances her professional life with her love for outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor. i live in a three storey house.
